alert.note: Alert for Eastern Monmouth; Mercer; Middlesex; Northwestern Burlington; Ocean; Western Monmouth (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 18 at 8:13PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT NORTHWESTERN OCEAN...SOUTHEASTERN MERCER...NORTHWESTERN BURLINGTON...MONMOUTH...MIDDLESEX AND SOUTHEASTERN BUCKS COUNTIES... At 812 PM EST, snow showers were located along a line extending from Colonia to Bristol. Movement was east at 45 mph. Locations impacted include... Trenton, New Brunswick, Perth Amboy, Long Branch, Asbury Park, Sandy Hook, Edison, Middletown, Old Bridge, Howell, East Brunswick, South Brunswick, Sayreville, North Brunswick, Marlboro, Manalapan, Carteret, Tinton Falls, Holmdel and Red Bank. This includes the following highways... New Jersey Turnpike between exits 6 and 12. Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 357 and 359. Interstate 95 in Pennsylvania near mile marker 39. Interstate 195 in New Jersey between mile markers 0 and 34. Interstate 295 in New Jersey between mile markers 50 and 67. Interstate 287 in New Jersey between mile markers 0 and 3. Garden State Parkway between mile markers 97 and 134.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Monmouth; Mercer; Middlesex; Northwestern Burlington; Ocean; Western Monmouth
